name: calculator_tool
description: Performs basic arithmetic operations and advanced mathematical functions (square root, power, logarithm, sine, cosine, tangent) on one or two numbers.

num1.description: The first number (or the only number for single-argument functions like sqrt, sin, cos, tan).

num2.description: The second number (for two-argument functions like add, subtract, multiply, divide, power, or the base for logarithm). Optional for single-argument functions.

operation.description: The arithmetic operation or mathematical function to perform (add, subtract, multiply, divide, sqrt, power, log, sin, cos, tan).
